response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and rarity, I believe it's only fair to extend this offer with a special consideration. For a limited time, I am willing to sell the product to you for $12,500. This price reflects not only the true worth of the item but also allows us to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12500}
